Recurring Buys Get Started Instead of timing the market, many smart investors use \nDollar Cost Averaging. The strategy is pretty simple \nInvest the same amount every week. When the price goes down, \nYou’ll buy more crypto. When the price goes up. \nYou’ll buy less crypto. But does it work?\nOver the past 5 years, buying Bitcoin every week performed better than timing the market \n86% of the time. Calculation is based on one $30 purchase a week on a random day. \"Timing the market\" is defined as buying Bitcoin on every 6% dip.\nLearn more → One time One time Daily Daily Once a Week Weekly Twice a Month Once a Month Monthly Frequency On %s Every other %s around %s On the %s On the Last Day of the Month on the last day Today Recurring buy unavailable Please use a different payment method to set up a recurring buy Select frequency OK You’ll be charged %1$s %2$s for the market equivalent of %3$s.
